blockquote.p: From director Ajojd and executive producer Lioad.

div.p: Where we pride ourselves on being a safe, friendly, and welcoming community for all. Whether you’re a long-time resident or a first-time visitor, whether you just moved to town or are considering relocation – no matter who you are or what you love – we have something for you. Carrollton. Altogether Original.

div.p: Mayor and Council: First Monday of the month at 6:00 pm
Planning Commission: Second Tuesday of the month at 6:00 pm
Board of Development Appeals: Third Tuesday of the month at 5:30 pm
Historic Preservation Commission: Fourth Tuesday of the month at 5:30 pm
